script.name: !init.ship.commandupgrade
script.description: Init script for the map ship command to needed upgrade. For player owned ships.
script.sourceplaintext:
* --- Not Player Commands ------------- $upgrade = null set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_INVASION upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_PATROL upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_PREACH upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_COLLECT_SPACEFLY upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_LAUNCHMISSILE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MARINE_MOVEHOME upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MOVE_WINGFORMATION upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_WINGFORMATION upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Standard Commands ------------- $upgrade = [TRUE] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DOCKAT upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_STAY upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_IDLE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FOLLOW upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MOVE_SECTOR upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MOVE_POS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_RETURN_HOME upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MOVETOBOARD upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DEPLOY_FIGHTERS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FREIGHT_DROP upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FREIGHT_FETCH upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_UNDOCK upgrade=$upgrade
*set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_TARGET upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FLEET_ATTACK upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_CARRIER_RETURN upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR upgrade=Jumpdrive
set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_COLLECTWARE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REPAIR_TARGET upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_REPAIRSHIPS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_REPAIR_STATION upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_SCANASTEROID upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_SCANSHIPS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_MAPSECTOR upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_RECONDRONE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_MINING upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_MISSILEDEF upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_SPACEFLY upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_COMBAT upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_DISRUPT upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_MARINES upgrade=$upgrade
set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_LAUNCH upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Drone Command Software ------------- $upgrade = Drone Command Software set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_RECON_MAPSECTOR upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_RECON_MAPSECTOR upgrade=Recon Drone set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DRONE_SUPPLYSHIPS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER upgrade=Trade Command Software MK2 add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER upgrade=Freight Drone
* --- Build Command Software MK 1 ------------- $upgrade = Build Command Software MK2 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_PACK_STATION upgrade=$upgrade script=!ship.cmdcheck.notplayership
* --- Navigation Command Software MK 1 ------------- $upgrade = Navigation Command Software MK1 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JUMP_STATION upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JUMP_POSITION upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MOVE_COORDS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JUMPTOME upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_SHIP_JUMPHOME upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MOVE_TO_OBJECT upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JUMP_STATION upgrade=Jumpdrive add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JUMP_POSITION upgrade=Jumpdrive add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JUMPTOME upgrade=Jumpdrive add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_SHIP_JUMPHOME upgrade=Jumpdrive
* --- Fight Command Software MK 1 ------------- $upgrade = Fight Command Software MK1 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_BIGSHIPS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_FIGHTERS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_PROTECT upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FLEET_ATTACKALLENEMIES upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FLEET_DEFENDSECTOR upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FLEET_DEFENDSTATION upgrade=$upgrade
*set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_KILL_ENEMIES upgrade=$upgrade *set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_PROTECT upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Fight Command Software MK 2 ------------- $upgrade = Fight Command Software MK2 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_RETURN upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_TARGET upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_NEAREST upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_SAME upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_BOARDSHIP upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_RANGE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_AND_LAND upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DEFEND_STATION upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MISSILE_ATTACK upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_RETREAT upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_ATTACK_SHIELDS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DEFEND_SECTOR upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_LAUNCH_ALLMARINES upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FLEET_INVADESECTOR upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FLEET_PATROL upgrade=$upgrade
*set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILE_DEFENCE upgrade=$upgrade *set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILEONLY upgrade=$upgrade *set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_FIGHTER upgrade=$upgrade *set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_CAPITAL upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Trade Command Software MK 1 ------------- $upgrade = Trade Command Software MK1 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_GET_WARE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_SELL_WARE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MANUAL_TRADE_BUY upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MANUAL_TRADE_SELL upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TRADE_FETCH upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TRADE_DELIVER upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Trade Command Software MK 2 ------------- $upgrade = Trade Command Software MK2 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_GET_WARE_BEST upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_SELL_WARE_BEST upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TRADE_DISTRIBUTE upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Trade Command Software MK 3 ------------- *$upgrade = Trade Command Software MK3 * Sector/Unitrader commands see setup.plugin.autotrade
* --- Special Command Software MK 1 ------------- $upgrade = Special Command Software MK1 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_COLLECT_FLYINGWARES upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_COLLECT_WARE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_COLLECT_DEBRIS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_COLLECT_ASTRONAUT upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_RECYCLE_SHIP upgrade=$upgrade script=!ship.cmdcheck.hq set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REPAIR_SHIP upgrade=$upgrade script=!ship.cmdcheck.hq.repair set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REVERSE_SHIP upgrade=$upgrade script=!ship.cmdcheck.hq set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_SHIP_LOADOUT upgrade=$upgrade script=!ship.cmdcheck.hq set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_COLLECT_DEPLOYED upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_COLLECT_ASTRONAUT upgrade=Cargo Lifesupport System add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_COLLECT_DEBRIS upgrade=Ore Collector add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TRANSPORT_PASSENGERS upgrade=Cargo Lifesupport System
* --- Mining Command Software MK 1 ------------- $upgrade = Mining Command Software set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MINE_AUTO upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MINE_AUTO upgrade=Ore Collector set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MINING_DEBRIS upgrade=Special Command Software MK1 add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MINING_DEBRIS upgrade=Ore Collector add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MINING_DEBRIS upgrade=Mineral Scanner set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TRADE_MINE upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TRADE_MINE upgrade=Mineral Scanner add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TRADE_MINE upgrade=Ore Collector set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MINE_HOMEBASE upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MINE_HOMEBASE upgrade=Mineral Scanner add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MINE_HOMEBASE upgrade=Ore Collector
* --- Explorer Command Software ------------- $upgrade = Explorer Command Software set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_EXPLORE_SECTOR upgrade=$upgrade *set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DEPLOY_SATS upgrade=$upgrade script=!ship.cmdcheck.deploysats set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DEPLOY_SATS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FLYTHROUGH_GATE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_SCAN_ASTEROID upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_SCAN_ASTEROID upgrade=Mineral Scanner
* --- Resupply Command Software ------------- $upgrade = Supply Command Software set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_EQUIPLIKE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REARM upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REFUEL upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_RESUPPLY upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Manual Trade Commands ------------- $upgrade = Trading System Extension set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_MANUAL_TRADE_RUN upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REMOTE_BESTBUY upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REMOTE_BESTSELL upgrade=$upgrade add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REMOTE_BESTBUY upgrade=Best Buys Locator add additional command upgrade: command=COMMAND_REMOTE_BESTSELL upgrade=Best Selling Price Locator *$upgrade = Best Buys Locator *$upgrade = Best Selling Price Locator
* --- Carrier Command Software ------------- $upgrade = Carrier Command Software set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_CARRIER_RECALL upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_CARRIER_REPAIR upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_CARRIER_REPLACE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_CARRIER_COLLECT upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Patrol Command Software ------------- $upgrade = Patrol Command Software set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_PATROL_SINGLE upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_PATROL_MULTI upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_PATROL_SCOUT upgrade=$upgrade
$upgrade = Piracy Command Software set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_PIRATE_PLUNDERSHIPS upgrade=$upgrade script=!ship.cmdcheck.notplayership
$upgrade = Build Command Software MK3 set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_BUILD_COMPLEX upgrade=$upgrade
* --- Fleet commands ------------------ $upgrade = [TRUE] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_CALLTOARMS upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_JOINWITHFLEET upgrade=$upgrade $upgrade = Transporter Device set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_FLEET_RESUPPLY upgrade=$upgrade
$upgrade = Freight Scanner set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_SCANSHIP upgrade=$upgrade
@ = [THIS] -> call script !plugin.gz.missile.def.mk3.menu : Mode='refresh' Race or THIS=null Script=null Turret script array=null * This assigns command wares to the turret commands. * Which wares are required depends on what the player "builds into" his scripts.
* war commands (not used by player) $upgrade = null set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_WAR_DEFENDSECTOR upgrade=$upgrade set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_WAR_INVADESECTORS upgrade=$upgrade
$upgrade = Interplanetary Drive System set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_INTERPLANETARY upgrade=$upgrade
set equipment install script: ware=Missile Defence System, script=plugin.missiledef.run, task=[Task.MissileDef]
return null
* 6: Removed Nav Mk1 requirement for jump

line.comment: *set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_DEPLOY_SATS upgrade=$upgrade script=!ship.cmdcheck.deploysats

comment.var: This assigns command wares to the turret commands.
Which wares are required depends on what the player "builds into" his scripts.
6: Removed Nav Mk1 requirement for jump

sval.val: Init script for the map ship command to needed upgrade. For player owned ships.
This assigns command wares to the turret commands.
Which wares are required depends on what the player "builds into" his scripts.
6: Removed Nav Mk1 requirement for jump
